synopsis.text: Sanshiro Kurenai, a promising young judo practitioner and the sole heir to his family's dojo, is left devastated when he discovers his father's lifeless body and a single glass eye near the scene of the crime. Determined to avenge his father's death and restore his family's honor, Sanshiro embarks on a perilous journey alongside his steadfast friend, Ken, and their loyal canine companion, Boke. Armed with a unique fighting style passed down from his father, Sanshiro battles various adversaries in search of the elusive one-eyed murderer, but not every one-eyed foe they encounter is connected to the tragic event. As they navigate through a world of martial arts and deception, the trio must remain steadfast in their pursuit of justice and the truth behind the glass eye. Will Sanshiro ever find the true culprit and bring his family the closure they deserve?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
